meta.@content: Left hand, using high-fidelity definitions for HAnim version 2.0
Kwan-Hee YOO, Don Brutzman and Joe Williams
fix visible geometry for thumb and index finger, midcarpal_1 and midcarpal_2
not yet to scale, also relatively flat
